comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Eleanor Adams Bryant was married to Frederick F. A. Pearson on November 24, 1915 New-York tribune., November 25, 1915, Page 9 In 1920, F. F. A. Pearson was Secretary to the American Embassy in London query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=FB0F17F83D5411... He was the son of Commander Frederick Pearson of the U.S. Navy (www.history.navy.mil/bios/pearson.htm, en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frederick_Pearson_%28Alaska%29) see New York Evening Post, May 17, 1928, (first column)
